MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG11 postcode area of Lockerbie. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:50am to progress with repairs to a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:53am on the 10th of November 2020.
